subject: npmx Weekly #5
headline: npmx Weekly #5
intro: This week, we celebrate significant milestones and growth within our community. Join us as we highlight the importance of design in open source and recognize our achievements together.

topics.title: Open Source Software Design Needs
topics.summary: A call for more designers and product people in the open source software community, emphasizing the importance of user experience and product management.

topics.title: Celebratory Milestones
topics.summary: npmx has reached 2,000 stars on GitHub, marking a significant achievement that reflects the dedication of our community members.

topics.title: Community Growth
topics.summary: npmx is thriving with over 500 members, showcasing heightened interest and engagement, promising a bright future for collaboration and development.
